chunk:
2-3 drops into palms, warm between hands, & gently press into skin. Use as needed. To maximize shelf life, store in a cool, dark area.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
